text:
Hey! I'm wondering what "content types" is defined as in the HubSpot world :slightly_smiling_face:

From "where I come from" content types are e.g. the blueprint/data model of a entity, but is is something specific in HS?
From the article below it mention "content types" in the chapter "Website Pages, Landing Pages, Blogs, and Emails" - are these 4 things considered just that? Anything else / something else?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/key-concepts#website-pages-landing-pages-blogs-and-emails>
It's the last number in the url

Hi everyone! I am a junior developer a few months out of a coding bootcamp. I got a job with a company that uses HubSpot and have a handful of what honestly feel like stupid questions, but I just want to make sure I'm getting everything set up right - Does anyone have about 30 minutes with me this evening (US EST) or tomorrow?
Hello everyone, I’m using the API integrations but I need to do it some specific queries, is anyone who can help me with my doubts?

Hey <@U04B21R4KGE> welcome to the community! I def recommend just slapping your questions in here directly. If it’s code related — some screenshots or coded examples are helpful. Otherwise, def don’t fret about the “difficulty” of the question. Everyone is here to help!

how do we set robots.txt to only allow `HubSpotContentSearchBot` to index `/foo/`?
Here is what I have so far, but I’m not sure if this is correct.
```User-agent: *
Disallow: /foo/

User-agent: HubSpotContentSearchBot
Disallow: ```

<https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33617859/disallow-all-for-all-user-agents-except-one-user-agent|Thanks to stack overflow> this did the trick
```User-agent: *
Disallow: /foo/

User-agent: HubSpotContentSearchBot
Allow: /foo/
Disallow: ```
:mag: How do we get HubSpot to reindex a blog or directory?
I like this question a lot. I have no idea.
Why do you need HubSpot to reindex it? Like the bot? What’s the purpose?
Like… HubSpot what? Reindex to what? Is it not in your site map and now you want it to be?
I think it's for site search, right <@U3T21PDBK>?
